experience.description:
•	Project Portfolio Management (up to 50 projects)
•	End to End processes control and improvement across the regions (AS-IS and TO-BE)
•	Operational management of the program activities: scope definition, time and budget control, resources estimations, quality, and risk management
•	PM team management: hiring, build team, goal setting, motivation, coordination, performance review
•	PMO representative in the Regions (RCIS, EE, MEA)
•	Intercompany settlements, Track budget, resource capacity and utilization across R&D, make analysis and reporting

Main Achievements:
-       Software Delivery Process was revised and relaunched in MEA region.
-	Successfully implemented Program of Projects (including server solutions integration and deployment) which yielded Ingenico become HW and SW supplier for the Tinkoff Bank.
-	Formed PM team and restarted portfolio and project management in the regions.
-	I was awarded in yearly category "There is no limit to perfection" and as a part of PMO team for the launching and improvements in "End to end processes".

•	Project Portfolio Management in RCIS (up to 25 projects), prioritization, capacity, risk management
•	Leading and managing strategic software development projects from inception to completion (requirements elicitation, Statements of Work preparation, planning, executing, monitoring and control, risk and change management, closing) 
•	Track budget, resource capacity and utilization in the RCIS region
•	PMO representative in the RCIS

Main achievements:
-	Project Management Process unification and improvement: migration from Request Tracker to Jira, Sciforma implementation in the RCIS region. As a result, transparency, effectiveness of monitoring and control for projects was increased. 
-	Successfully implemented Online Fiscalisation projects in Armenia and Uzbekistan, three new products were launched on the market (including server solutions deployment).
-	Successfully implemented Fuel project for Zenit bank and Tatneft.
-	Android ECR (SHTRIH-KART-F) with certified (PA DSS / OpenWay, SmartVista, TPTP / MC, VISA, MIR) Payment Service Application was launched.
-	SwS loyalty plugin integration with DLS was finished.

•	Collect, analyse and validate business requirements 
•	Scope definition and validation, Statements of Work preparation
•	Scope, schedule and quality management based on requirements
•	Prepare project management plans and roadmaps
•	Manage and control project risks and prepare risk responses
•	Work with subcontractors

Main achievements:
-	Agile Software Development approach (Scrum) was successfully implemented. I took role of Scrum Master.
-	PoC of Payment Service Solution on the Android terminal was released. I led this project and performed demonstration to Zenit Bank.  
-	Took an active part in SW Dev process improvement (DevOps).
-	Virtual fuel cards, Fuel coupons was implemented for VBRR and Rossneft.
-	Loyalty program was implemented for Bashneft.
-	Payments cards support was added to «Public transport» application for Avangard Bank. 
-	"Chaika Tips" solution was implemented.

•	Leading and management teams on the projects
•	Work closely with Account Managers and Customers to facilitate the identification/definition of business requirement
•	Write software requirements, define architecture and detailed design
•	Projects estimations and planning
•	Perform software development and verification activities, code review
•	Commercial SW development / Develop new features
•	Software Maintenance (bug-fixing, L3 level support)
•	Process improvement

Main achievements:
-	I was appointed and acted as Head of SW Development and Project Manager during their absence.
-	Made POS-terminals monitoring solution presentation on summit in Mongolia.
-	Made a presentation at Ingenico R&D Technical Summit.
-	«Fuel+» project with VBRR Bank was successfully done. 
-	«Public Transport» project with Avangard Bank was successfully done.
-	«Tips for Waiters» solution with RFI Bank was launched.

•	Work closely with Account Managers and Customers to facilitate the identification/definition of business requirement
•	Commercial SW development / Develop new features
•	Software Maintenance (bug-fixing, L3 level support)
•	Estimate development tasks for the new features

Main achievements:
-	«School meal» project with Avangard Bank was successfully done. I worked on requirements with customer, was preparing architecture and design, statement of work, estimations. I developed solution according to plan, controlled QA and Testing, delivery and implementation.
-	Design and implementation hardware independent GUI API.
-	Actively participated in SW Development Process improvement (git, night builds).
Commercial SW development for the POS-terminals
Embedded applications development and FPGA configuration for telecommunication equipment (PDH / SDH / WDM).
